titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the "Constitution for the State of New Columbia Approval Act of 1987".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

bill.summary: 6/4/1987--Introduced. States that the Congress disapproves of the action of the District of Columbia Council in passing the Constitution for the State of New Columbia Approval Act of 1987.
